org.spdx.rdfparser
Class SPDXLicenseInfoFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.spdx.rdfparser.SPDXLicenseInfoFactory

public class SPDXLicenseInfoFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory for creating SPDXLicenseInfo objects from a Jena model

Author:
Gary O'Neall

Constructor Summary
SPDXLicenseInfoFactory()
           
 
Method Summary
static boolean isStandardLicenseID(java.lang.String licenseID)
           
static SPDXLicenseInfo parseSPDXLicenseString(java.lang.String licenseString)
          Parses a license string and converts it into a SPDXLicenseInfo object Syntax - A license set must start and end with a parenthesis "(" A conjunctive license set will have and AND after the first licenseInfo term A disjunctive license set will have an OR after the first licenseInfo term If there is no And or Or, then it is converted to a simple license type (standard or non-standard) A space or tab must be used between license ID's and the keywords AND and OR A licenseID must NOT be "AND" or "OR"

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

parseSPDXLicenseString

public static SPDXLicenseInfo parseSPDXLicenseString(java.lang.String licenseString)
                                              throws InvalidLicenseStringException
Parses a license string and converts it into a SPDXLicenseInfo object Syntax - A license set must start and end with a parenthesis "(" A conjunctive license set will have and AND after the first licenseInfo term A disjunctive license set will have an OR after the first licenseInfo term If there is no And or Or, then it is converted to a simple license type (standard or non-standard) A space or tab must be used between license ID's and the keywords AND and OR A licenseID must NOT be "AND" or "OR"

Parameters:
licenseString - String conforming to the syntax
Returns:
an SPDXLicenseInfo created from the string
Throws:
InvalidLicenseStringException

isStandardLicenseID

public static boolean isStandardLicenseID(java.lang.String licenseID)
Parameters:
licenseID -
Returns:
true if the licenseID belongs to a standard license
